description: The Ramble Collection brings all the cozy comforts of your favorite hoodie, for your feet. The Ramble Puff features water resistant rip-stop nylon with custom quilted design and synthetic overlays for added durability. Designed to keep your feet cozy all day, the Ramble Puff is made with Chaco’s signature LUVSEAT™ footbed. Add an irresistibly soft fleece lining and keep the cold out, all season long.
name: Chaco Ramble Puff - Mens
